Most file-sharing tools take one of two paths:
they either lock you into subscriptions, or they monetize your data and activity.
Pushray takes a different approach.
Why Pushray? #1. Privacy comes first #Every file shared through Pushray is encrypted end-to-end.
We don’t read your files, track your activity, or build profiles about you.
Security and privacy are defaults â€” not features.
2. A clean, usage-based model #Instead of monthly fees, Pushray is simple:
downloaders pay only when they download, and uploaders earn a share of the revenue.
This aligns incentives in a way traditional platforms never did.
Great content is rewarded, not hidden behind ads or algorithms.
3. Designed for creators and individuals alike #Whether you’re sharing:
book summaries audio guides research files templates digital assets â€¦or anything else you want delivered securely, Pushray helps you share without worrying about bandwidth cost, storage, or tracking.
How It Works # Upload your file (encrypted automatically) Share your link Downloads consume free bandwidth first When free quota is used up, downloaders pay a small fee You earn a share of that fee Simple, transparent, and fair.
What’s Next #This is just the beginning.
Over the coming months, Pushray will introduce:
creator tools analytics that respect privacy better previews improved audio and long-form content support API access for developers We’re building this platform with long-term security and transparency in mind â€” not quick growth hacks.
Final Thoughts #Pushray is our answer to a simple question:
How can file sharing be private, fair, and sustainable at the same time?
We’re excited for you to try it, share your work, and help shape what comes next.
Stay tuned â€” more updates are coming soon.
